comment.author: 70841806@N08
comment._content: I live about three miles from this house, and its in Rossville GA, not Ringgold. It's probably 20 minutes by car from Ringgold, and an 1 and 45 minutes from Atlanta' but only about 5 from the TN border and Chattanooga. Just FYI, and Thanks SO much for posting all these, my kids are really into Civil War history.
